name: Bad Feather Day
description:
Lonely bird...man on a quest for revenge!

Bad Feather Day follows the wizard Tengu who against his will has been transformed into a bird. Tengu seeks to get his original form back by brewing a potion that will restore his lost body. While exploring the forest, Tengu must fend off the rancorous beasts that lurk within.

Bad Feather Day is a short third person adventure platformer where the player plays as a bird with hands. Using the hands of the bird, player has to survive until the end of the game by punching and throwing bananas.  The goal of the game is to collect three keys and then defeat the final boss arena. There are talking animal characters in the game that advise player to move forward. The game is graphically executed in a "low poly" style with bright vibrant colors. The game features humorous animal mumble and forest sounds.
